mapper.select: SELECT a.dt AS day , NVL(SUM(b.pay_price), 0) AS daily_sales, NVL(COUNT(b.pay_price), 0) AS daily_sales_cnt FROM (SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-7 + LEVEL, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS dt FROM dual CONNECT BY LEVEL <= 7) a, (SELECT TO_CHAR(order_date, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS day , pay_price FROM orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-6,'YYYY.MM.DD') AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE+1 , 'YYYY.MM.DD')) b WHERE a.dt = b.day(+) GROUP BY a.dt ORDER BY a.dt DESC

SELECT SUM(daily_sales) AS daily_sales_total, SUM(daily_sales_cnt) AS sales_cnt_total FROM (SELECT a.dt AS day , NVL(SUM(b.pay_price), 0) AS daily_sales, NVL(COUNT(b.pay_price), 0) AS daily_sales_cnt FROM (SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-7 + LEVEL, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS dt FROM dual CONNECT BY LEVEL <= 7) a, (SELECT TO_CHAR(order_date, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS day , pay_price FROM orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-6,'YYYY.MM.DD') AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE+1 , 'YYYY.MM.DD')) b WHERE a.dt = b.day(+) GROUP BY a.dt)

SELECT a.dt AS day , NVL(SUM(b.pay_price), 0) AS daily_sales, NVL(COUNT(b.pay_price), 0) AS daily_sales_cnt FROM (SELECT TO_CHAR(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM') + LEVEL - 1, 'MM.DD') AS dt FROM dual CONNECT BY LEVEL <= TO_CHAR(LAST_DAY(sysdate),'DD')) a, (SELECT TO_CHAR(order_date, 'MM.DD') AS day , pay_price FROM orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN (TO_CHAR(TRUNC(SYSDATE,'MM'),'YYYYMMDD')) AND (LAST_DAY(SYSDATE))) b WHERE a.dt = b.day(+) GROUP BY a.dt ORDER BY a.dt

SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM') AS month, SUM(daily_sales) AS daily_sales_total, SUM(daily_sales_cnt) AS sales_cnt_total FROM (SELECT a.dt AS day , NVL(SUM(b.pay_price), 0) AS daily_sales, NVL(COUNT(b.pay_price), 0) AS daily_sales_cnt FROM (SELECT TO_CHAR(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM') + LEVEL - 1, 'MM.DD') AS dt FROM dual CONNECT BY LEVEL <= TO_CHAR(LAST_DAY(sysdate),'DD')) a, (SELECT TO_CHAR(order_date, 'MM.DD') AS day , pay_price FROM orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN (TO_CHAR(TRUNC(SYSDATE,'MM'),'YYYYMMDD')) AND (LAST_DAY(SYSDATE))) b WHERE a.dt = b.day(+) GROUP BY a.dt)
